languages.text: {n}Иокаста, несомненно проникшись вашей идеей, закатывает глаза и едва слышно бормочет под нос:{/n} "Император, дай мне терпения... Так точно, Лорд-капитан. Будем читать ему псалмы".

{n}Undoubtedly inspired by your idea, Sauerback rolls her eyes and faintly mutters under her breath,{/n} "Emperor, grant me strength... It will be done, Lord Captain. We will recite psalms to the prisoner."
languages.original_text: {n}Иокаста, несомненно проникшись вашей идеей, закатывает глаза и едва слышно бормочет под нос:{/n} "Император, дай мне терпения... Так точно, Лорд-капитан. Будем читать ему псалмы".

languages.text: {n}Sauerback rollt von deiner Idee inspiriert mit den Augen und murmelt leise vor sich hin. {/n} "Imperator, gib mir Kraft ... Wird erledigt, Lord Captain. Wir werden dem Gefangenen Psalmen vorlesen."
languages.original_text: {n}Undoubtedly inspired by your idea, Sauerback rolls her eyes and faintly mutters under her breath,{/n} "Emperor, grant me strength... It will be done, Lord Captain. We will recite psalms to the prisoner."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sauerback rollt von deiner Idee inspiriert mit den Augen und murmelt leise vor sich hin. {/n} "Imperator, gib mir Kraft ... Wird erledigt, Lord Captain. Wir werden dem Gefangenen Psalmen vorlesen."

languages.text: {n}Visiblement inspirée par votre suggestion, Sauerback lève les yeux au ciel en murmurant :{/n} « Empereur, donnez-moi la force... Ce sera fait, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Nous allons lire des psaumes au prisonnier. »
languages.original_text: {n}Undoubtedly inspired by your idea, Sauerback rolls her eyes and faintly mutters under her breath,{/n} "Emperor, grant me strength... It will be done, Lord Captain. We will recite psalms to the prisoner."

traits.locale_text: {n}Visiblement inspirée par votre suggestion, Sauerback lève les yeux au ciel en murmurant :{/n} « Empereur, donnez-moi la force... Ce sera fait, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Nous allons lire des psaumes au prisonnier. »

languages.text: {n}Sin duda inspirada por tu idea, Sauerback pone los ojos en blanco y murmura para sus adentros.{/n} «Emperador, dame fuerzas... Así se hará, Lord Capitán. Recitaremos salmos al prisionero».
languages.original_text: {n}Undoubtedly inspired by your idea, Sauerback rolls her eyes and faintly mutters under her breath,{/n} "Emperor, grant me strength... It will be done, Lord Captain. We will recite psalms to the prisoner."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sin duda inspirada por tu idea, Sauerback pone los ojos en blanco y murmura para sus adentros.{/n} «Emperador, dame fuerzas... Así se hará, Lord Capitán. Recitaremos salmos al prisionero».

languages.text: {n}明らかにあなたのアイデアに触発され、ザウアーバックは目を丸くして息をひそめてひそかに呟く。{/n}「皇帝よ、我に力を…かしこまりました、ロード・キャプテン。囚人に聖歌を与えるとしましょう」
languages.original_text: {n}Undoubtedly inspired by your idea, Sauerback rolls her eyes and faintly mutters under her breath,{/n} "Emperor, grant me strength... It will be done, Lord Captain. We will recite psalms to the prisoner."

traits.locale_text: {n}明らかにあなたのアイデアに触発され、ザウアーバックは目を丸くして息をひそめてひそかに呟く。{/n}「皇帝よ、我に力を…かしこまりました、ロード・キャプテン。囚人に聖歌を与えるとしましょう」

languages.text: {n}毫无疑问，你的提议说动了苏尔贝克。她翻着眼睛，低声嘟囔起来。{/n}“帝皇啊，赐予我力量吧……遵命，舰长大人，我们准备为这个囚犯朗诵祷告词。”
languages.original_text: {n}Undoubtedly inspired by your idea, Sauerback rolls her eyes and faintly mutters under her breath,{/n} "Emperor, grant me strength... It will be done, Lord Captain. We will recite psalms to the prisoner."

traits.locale_text: {n}毫无疑问，你的提议说动了苏尔贝克。她翻着眼睛，低声嘟囔起来。{/n}“帝皇啊，赐予我力量吧……遵命，舰长大人，我们准备为这个囚犯朗诵祷告词。”

languages.text: {n}Fikrinden cesaret bulduğuna kuşku olmayan Sauerback, gözlerini yuvarlayarak kısık sesle belli belirsiz mırıldanıyor.{/n} "İmparator, bana kuvvet bahşet... Başüstüne Lord Kaptan. Mahkûma ilahi okuyacağız."
languages.original_text: {n}Undoubtedly inspired by your idea, Sauerback rolls her eyes and faintly mutters under her breath,{/n} "Emperor, grant me strength... It will be done, Lord Captain. We will recite psalms to the prisoner."
